title: Dutch health inspectors warn of deadly risks from online peptides
title_zh: 荷兰卫生检查员警告：网上购买的肽类产品存在致命风险
description: The Dutch Health and Youth Care Inspectorate (IGJ) is warning that peptides purchased online could pose serious or even fatal risks.
description_zh: 荷兰卫生和青年保健监察局 (IGJ) 警告称，从网上购买的肽类药物可能带来严重甚至致命的风险。

title: Study finds that over half of Dutch support parts of Trump’s MAGA ideology
title_zh: 研究发现，超过半数的荷兰人支持特朗普“让美国再次伟大”（MAGA）意识形态的部分内容。
description: More than half of the Netherlands’ population supports parts of U.S.
description_zh: 荷兰超过一半的人口支持美国的部分业务。

title: Slippery roads across Netherlands as snow sweeps in, drivers urged to exercise caution
title_zh: 荷兰各地道路湿滑，大雪来袭，司机们被敦促谨慎驾驶。
description: The Netherlands is under acode yellowweather alert as a snow front moves from the so
description_zh: 荷兰目前处于黄色天气预警状态，一股降雪锋面正从南部向东移动。

title: NS trains overrun with trash after carnival celebrations
title_zh: 狂欢节庆祝活动结束后，NS列车上堆满了垃圾。
description: Dutch rail operator Nederlandse Spoorwegen (NS)statedthat trains were left in a state
description_zh: 荷兰铁路运营商Nederlandse Spoorwegen (NS)表示，列车被遗弃在……状态

title: Highly contagious scabies case reported at Almere hospital; Preventive measures underway
title_zh: 阿尔梅勒医院报告一例传染性极强的疥疮病例；预防措施正在进行中
description: A patient at the Flevoziekenhuis in Almere has been diagnosed with a highly contagious form of scabies, known as scabiës crustosa. The patient is isolated and receiving care separately.
description_zh: 阿尔梅勒弗莱沃齐肯胡伊斯医院的一名患者被诊断出患有传染性极强的疥疮，即硬皮疥疮。该患者已被隔离并接受单独治疗。

title: Jens van ’t Wout wins second olympic gold as Jenning de Boo claims silver
title_zh: 延斯·范特沃特赢得第二枚奥运金牌，詹宁斯·德布获得银牌。
description: Dutch shorttrack skater Jens van ’t Wout won his second gold medal of the 2026 Winter Olympics on Saturday, capturing the 1,500-meter event in a chaotic finale that saw multiple competitors fall.
description_zh: 荷兰短道速滑运动员延斯·范特·沃特周六赢得了他在2026年冬季奥运会上的第二枚金牌，在1500米比赛中夺冠。比赛最后阶段混乱不堪，多名选手摔倒在地。

title: Pedestrian dies after being hit on A50 near Sint-Oedenrode
title_zh: 一名行人在圣奥登罗德附近的A50公路上被撞身亡
description: A pedestrian died early Sunday after being struck on the A50 highway near Sint-Oedenrode, police in Oost-Brabant reported.
description_zh: 据东布拉班特省警方报道，周日凌晨，一名行人在圣奥登罗德附近的A50高速公路上被撞身亡。

title: Dutch dental chain Atlas accused of systematic billing fraud
title_zh: 荷兰连锁牙科诊所Atlas被指控系统性欺诈收费。
description: Commercial dental chain Atlas Dental Care has been accused of manipulating patient bills for years, according to an investigation by EenVandaag.
description_zh: 据《EenVandaag》的一项调查显示，商业牙科连锁机构 Atlas Dental Care 多年来一直被指控操纵病人账单。

title: Nationwide code yellow issued as snow and ice create hazardous conditions
title_zh: 全国发布黄色预警，冰雪天气造成危险状况。
description: A nationwide code yellow warning for snow and icy roads will take effect Sunday afternoon across the Netherlands, with forecasters warning of hazardous travel conditions and up to 5 centimeters of
description_zh: 荷兰全国将于周日下午发布冰雪路面黄色预警，气象预报员警告称，道路状况危险，降雪量可能高达5厘米。

title: Snow forecast prompts Schiphol to cancel at least 150 flights Sunday
title_zh: 受降雪预报影响，史基浦机场周日取消至少150个航班。
description: Schiphol Airport has canceled a large number of flights on Sunday as a preventive measure because of expected snowfall, with at least 150 flights already taken out of the schedule, according to KLM
description_zh: 由于预计周日将有降雪，阿姆斯特丹史基浦机场已采取预防措施取消了大量航班。据荷兰皇家航空公司（KLM）称，目前至少已有150个航班被取消。

title: Oldest man in the Netherlands dies at 112
title_zh: 荷兰最长寿的男性去世，享年112岁
description: John Huang, the oldest man in the Netherlands and the Benelux, died Friday at 112, his family confirmed to
description_zh: 荷兰和比荷卢经济联盟最年长的男性约翰·黄于周五去世，享年112岁，他的家人证实了这一消息。

title: Jens van ’t Wout takes second gold, winning short-track 1,500m
title_zh: 延斯·范特沃特获得第二枚金牌，赢得短道速滑1500米冠军。
description: Jens van ’t Wout has picked up another Dutch gold medal at the Winter Olympics in Milan, this time in...
description_zh: 延斯·范特沃特在米兰冬奥会上再次为荷兰赢得一枚金牌，这次是在……

title: Schiphol cancels flights ahead of Sunday’s forecast snowfall
title_zh: 由于预计周日将有降雪，史基浦机场取消了部分航班。
description: At least 150 KLM flights to and from Schiphol airport have been cancelled on Sunday following weather forecasts which say...
description_zh: 由于天气预报显示……，周日至少有150个往返阿姆斯特丹史基浦机场的荷航航班被取消。

title: Scooter and moped thefts in Netherlands drop to 13-year low, cities still at risk
title_zh: 荷兰摩托车和轻便摩托车盗窃案降至13年来的最低水平，但城市仍面临风险
description: Theft claims for scooters, mopeds, and light motorcycles in the Netherlands have declined to their lowest levels since 2012, according to data from insurer Coöperatie Univé.
description_zh: 根据保险公司 Coöperatie Univé 的数据，荷兰踏板车、轻便摩托车和轻型摩托车的盗窃索赔已降至 2012 年以来的最低水平。

title: Museum Dokkum acquires rare 16th-century gold love ring
title_zh: 多库姆博物馆购得一枚罕见的16世纪黄金爱情戒指
description: Museum Dokkum hasaddeda rare gold love ring to its collection, marking the first of its kind in Friesland and only the sec
description_zh: 多库姆博物馆在其馆藏中新增了一枚罕见的黄金爱情戒指，这是弗里斯兰省首例，也是该省第二枚此类戒指。

title: Action recalls Stretch Squad toys after asbestos found in sand filling
title_zh: Action公司召回Stretch Squad玩具，原因是其沙子填充物中发现石棉。
description: Action has recalledStretch Squad pull-apart toy figures after traces of asbestos were foun
description_zh: Action公司召回了Stretch Squad可拆卸玩具人偶，原因是其中发现了石棉痕迹。

title: Shingles vaccine will be free to 60-year-olds from next year
title_zh: 从明年起，60岁及以上人士可免费接种带状疱疹疫苗。
description: People turning 60 will be invited for a shingles vaccination from next year, but those who have already passed the...
description_zh: 从明年起，年满 60 岁的人将被邀请接种带状疱疹疫苗，但那些已经超过 60 岁的人……

title: Jenning de Boo wins second Olympic silver, again behind Stolz
title_zh: 詹宁·德布再次获得奥运银牌，仅次于斯托尔茨。
description: Jenning de Boo won Olympic silver in the 500 metres on Saturday after again losing a head-to-head showdown with favourite...
description_zh: 詹宁斯·德布周六在500米比赛中获得奥运会银牌，此前他再次在与夺冠热门的正面交锋中落败……

title: Breda officials urge visitors to avoid city center amid carnival crowds
title_zh: 布雷达官员敦促游客在狂欢节期间避开市中心人潮。
description: The city of Breda has urged carnival attendees to avoid the city center due to extreme crowding Saturday. “The city center of Breda is filling up!
description_zh: 布雷达市政府敦促狂欢节参与者周六避开市中心，因为那里人潮拥挤。“布雷达市中心已经挤满了人！”

title: Stolen Odido data worth “gold” for criminals
title_zh: 被盗的Odido数据对犯罪分子来说价值连城
description: The stolen datafrom Dutch telecom provider Odido are worth “gold” for criminals, expert
description_zh: 专家表示，从荷兰电信运营商Odido窃取的数据对犯罪分子来说价值连城。

title: Dutch unemployment cuts could slash benefits for 50,000 workers, unions warn
title_zh: 工会警告：荷兰削减失业救济金可能导致5万名工人失去福利
description: Dutch labor unions CNV and FNV are warning thatchangesto unemployment benefits p
description_zh: 荷兰工会CNV和FNV警告称，失业救济金政策的改变可能会带来风险。

title: Number of Dutch flower and plant shops declines for fourth year straight
title_zh: 荷兰花卉植物商店数量连续第四年下降
description: The Netherlands has recorded a decline in the number of flower and plant shops for the fourth consecutive year, according to data from the Chamber of Commerce (KVK) analyzed by ANP for Valentine’s
description_zh: 根据荷兰商会（KVK）的数据，荷兰花卉植物商店的数量连续第四年下降。ANP 对这些数据进行了分析，并以此作为情人节的报道。

title: Missing 75-year-old woman found dead near construction site in Numansdorp
title_zh: 失踪的75岁妇女在努曼斯多普附近的一处建筑工地被发现身亡
description: A 75-year-old woman from Numansdorp who had been missing since Thursday afternoon has been found dead, police told
description_zh: 警方称，一名来自努曼斯多普的75岁妇女自周四下午失踪后，已被发现死亡。

title: Code yellow issued across Netherlands for Sunday as snow and ice approach
title_zh: 荷兰周日发布黄色预警，预计将有降雪和冰冻天气。
description: The Netherlands will face a nationwide yellow weather alert starting Sunday afternoon as snow and slippery conditions are expected, with the first snow hitting Zeeland, Zuid-Holland, and Noord-Brab
description_zh: 荷兰将于周日下午开始发布全国黄色天气预警，预计届时将有降雪和路面湿滑，泽兰省、南荷兰省和北布拉布省将率先迎来降雪。

title: Utrecht train service disrupted until at least 3:30 p.m. after overhead line break
title_zh: 乌特勒支火车服务因架空线路断裂而中断，至少持续到下午3:30。
description: Train service around Utrecht remains heavily disrupted Saturday after a broken overhead line caused multiple delays and damage Friday evening.
description_zh: 周五晚间，乌特勒支附近的一条架空电线断裂，导致多趟列车延误和损坏，周六该地区的火车服务仍然严重中断。

title: Baby dies at Ter Apel asylum center; Authorities call it accidental
title_zh: 一名婴儿在特尔阿佩尔难民营死亡；当局称这是一起意外事故。
description: A 10-month-old baby died Thursday at the Ter Apel asylum seekers reception center in Westerwolde, authorities confirmed.
description_zh: 当局证实，一名 10 个月大的婴儿于周四在韦斯特沃尔德的 Ter Apel 难民接待中心死亡。

title: Unions say they will fight hard-hitting jobless benefit reforms
title_zh: 工会表示，他们将反对力度巨大的失业救济金改革。
description: Unemployed people could lose up to €900 a month under the new cabinet’s plans to cut spending on jobless benefits...
description_zh: 根据新内阁削减失业救济金支出的计划，失业者每月最多可能损失900欧元……

title: Dutch flower growers massively using banned pesticides
title_zh: 荷兰花卉种植者大量使用禁用农药
description: Dutch greenhouse flower growers are misusing pesticides on a large scale, including substances that are banned.
description_zh: 荷兰温室花卉种植者大规模滥用杀虫剂，其中包括一些被禁用的物质。

title: 20-year-old dies in head-on collision with truck in Ritthem
title_zh: 里特姆一名20岁男子在与卡车迎面相撞事故中丧生
description: A 20-year-old man from Oost-Souburg died Saturday morning after his car collided head-on with a truck on Europaweg Noord,
description_zh: 周六上午，一名来自奥斯特-索堡的20岁男子在欧罗巴路北段驾车与一辆卡车迎面相撞后身亡。

title: Video: Resident seriously injured in Groningen home invasion; Police make armed arrests
title_zh: 视频：格罗宁根入室抢劫案：居民重伤；警方持枪逮捕嫌犯。
description: A resident was seriously injured Friday night during a home invasion on the Rode Weeshuisstraat in the center of Groningen, an attack that prompted armed police arrests nearby and a continuing sear
description_zh: 周五晚间，格罗宁根市中心罗德韦斯胡伊斯街发生一起入室抢劫案，一名居民身受重伤。袭击发生后，武装警察在附近展开逮捕行动，目前搜捕工作仍在进行中。

title: At least 645 Dutch nationals served in Israeli military during Gaza war, records show
title_zh: 记录显示，至少有645名荷兰公民在加沙战争期间为以色列军队服役。
description: At least 645 people holding Dutch nationality were serving in the Israeli military in March 2025, during the height of Israel’s war in Gaza, according to figures released by the Israeli army in res
description_zh: 根据以色列军方公布的数据，在2025年3月以色列对加沙发动战争的高峰期，至少有645名荷兰国籍人士在以色列军队服役。

title: Dutch courts extend detention for 12 of 16 suspects accused of spreading IS propaganda
title_zh: 荷兰法院延长了16名被控散布“伊斯兰国”宣传的嫌疑人中12人的拘留期限。
description: Most suspectsarrested across the Netherlandsthis week for allegedly spreading ext
description_zh: 本周在荷兰各地被捕的大多数嫌疑人涉嫌传播病毒

title: Dutch florists fee slower Valentine’s orders amid Carnival and holidays
title_zh: 荷兰花店在狂欢节和节假日期间处理情人节订单的速度较慢。
description: Carnival appears to be cutting into Valentine’s Day rose sales in the Netherlands this year.
description_zh: 今年荷兰的狂欢节似乎影响了情人节玫瑰的销量。

title: Amsterdam moves to cut sick leave for municipal employees after absenteeism reaches 9.7%
title_zh: 阿姆斯特丹在缺勤率达到9.7%后，决定削减市政员工的病假。
description: Amsterdam is moving to sharply curb elevated sick leave among municipal employees after absenteeism reached 9.7 percent last year, far above the national average of 6.7 percent, Mayor Femke Halsema
description_zh: 阿姆斯特丹市长费姆克·哈尔塞玛表示，该市正采取措施大幅遏制市政员工过高的病假率。去年，阿姆斯特丹的缺勤率高达9.7%，远高于6.7%的全国平均水平。

title: Investigator seize 12.5 million illegal cigarettes in three ops
title_zh: 调查人员在三次行动中查获1250万支非法香烟
description: Finance ministry investigators have seized 12.5 million illegal cigarettes in three separate criminal investigations over the past two weeks. Had...
description_zh: 财政部调查人员在过去两周的三项独立刑事调查中查获了1250万支非法香烟。

title: At least 645 Dutch nationals have been serving in Israeli army
title_zh: 至少有645名荷兰公民在以色列军队服役。
description: At least 645 Dutch nationals were serving in the Israeli army in March last year, according to documents released by...
description_zh: 根据公布的文件显示，去年3月至少有645名荷兰公民在以色列军队服役……

title: Cricket: Lights out as the US derail the Netherlands’ campaign
title_zh: 板球：美国队搅乱荷兰队的攻势，荷兰队最终黯然离场
description: Brief scores: Netherlands 103 all out (Bas de Leede 23, Harmeet Singh 4-21) lost to USA 196-6 (Mukkamalla 79, De...
description_zh: 简要比分：荷兰队103分全部出局（巴斯·德·利德23分，哈米特·辛格4-21）负于美国队196-6（穆卡马拉79分，德...

title: Record 32,000 anonymous tips help police catch suspects in 2025
title_zh: 创纪录的32000条匿名举报帮助警方在2025年抓获嫌疑人
description: Meld Misdaad Anoniem saw a record number of anonymous tips in 2025.
description_zh: Meld Misdaad Anoniem 的匿名举报数量在 2025 年创下了历史新高。

title: Churches from different cultures struggling to find space in the Netherlands
title_zh: 来自不同文化的教会都在努力寻找在荷兰的办公场所。
description: Christian churches that have come to the Netherlands from a different culture are struggling to find housing in the country.
description_zh: 来自其他文化的基督教教会来到荷兰后，在该国寻找住所变得十分困难。

title: Volendam stun PSV with late winner to hand leaders second defeat of the season
title_zh: 沃伦丹凭借最后时刻的绝杀击败埃因霍温，送给领头羊本赛季第二场失利。
description: PSV suffered their second defeat of the season in the Eredivisie on Friday. The league leaders lost 2-1 away to struggling FC Volendam.
description_zh: 埃因霍温周五在荷甲联赛中遭遇本赛季第二场失利。这支领头羊球队客场1-2不敌苦苦挣扎的沃伦丹队。

title: Home batteries can cut energy bills, but payback may take decades
title_zh: 家用电池可以降低能源费用，但收回成本可能需要数十年。
description: Homeowners in the Netherlands can lower their energy bills by adding home batteries, but it is still unclear how long it takes to recover the investment, the Dutch homeowners’ association Verenigin
description_zh: 荷兰房主可以通过安装家用电池来降低能源费用，但目前尚不清楚需要多长时间才能收回投资，荷兰房主协会Verenigin表示。

title: Enigmatic musician Irène Schrader talks imposter syndrome, modeling, and global roots
title_zh: 神秘音乐人艾琳·施拉德畅谈冒名顶替综合症、模特生涯和全球根源
description: From her childhood playing classical piano in China to her emergence as a multilingual pop talent, Irène Schrader has used music to bridge the various cultures she calls her own.
description_zh: 从在中国的童年时期学习古典钢琴，到成为一位精通多种语言的流行音乐人才，艾琳·施拉德一直用音乐来连接她称之为自己的各种文化。

title: Hundreds of passengers on Utrecht train that nearly derails; Evacuation planned
title_zh: 乌得勒支火车险些脱轨，数百名乘客；计划疏散
description: A train operated by national railway NS skipped over a loose track just south of Utrecht, at a the same spot where overhead electricity lines were also broken.
description_zh: 一列由荷兰国家铁路公司 (NS) 运营的火车在乌得勒支以南不远处的一段松动铁轨上打滑，而就在同一个地点，架空电力线也断裂了。

title: Netherlands still lacks permits for pesticides a year after Council of State ruling
title_zh: 荷兰在国务委员会裁决一年后，仍然缺乏农药许可证。
description: Dutch provinces have not issued a single permit for pesticides that could harm protected nature, nearly a year after the Council of State ruled such licenses are required.
description_zh: 尽管荷兰最高行政法院已裁定此类许可证是必要的，但近一年过去了，荷兰各省仍未颁发任何可能危害受保护自然环境的杀虫剂许可证。

title: Tesla to launch advanced self-driving system in the Netherlands, pending approval
title_zh: 特斯拉计划在荷兰推出先进的自动驾驶系统，尚待审批。
description: Tesla plans to introduce its advanced Full Self-Driving (Supervised) system in the Netherlands in the near future.
description_zh: 特斯拉计划在不久的将来在荷兰推出其先进的完全自动驾驶（监督式）系统。

title: Outgoing PM Dick Schoof reflects after final Cabinet meeting; Collapse was inevitable
title_zh: 即将卸任的首相迪克·舒夫在最后一次内阁会议后反思：崩溃是不可避免的。
description: After his final Cabinet meeting, outgoing Prime Minister Dick Schoof acknowledged that he had long expected his government would not complete its full term.
description_zh: 在最后一次内阁会议后，即将卸任的总理迪克·舒夫承认，他早就预料到他的政府不会完成整个任期。

title: Alleged threats and intimidation by student prompt VU to revise campus policies
title_zh: 据称学生的威胁和恐吓行为促使范德堡大学修改校园政策
description: Amsterdam’s Vrije Universiteit (VU) has unveiled new campus protocols in the wake of disturbing allegations against student Marlon U. Het Parool wrote that U.
description_zh: 阿姆斯特丹自由大学 (VU) 在学生 Marlon U. Het Parool 受到令人不安的指控后公布了新的校园协议。

title: NS urges travelers to plan ahead as Rotterdam, Amsterdam lines face delays this weekend
title_zh: 荷兰铁路公司（NS）敦促旅客提前规划行程，因为本周末鹿特丹和阿姆斯特丹的线路可能会出现延误。
description: Rail travelers at Rotterdam Central Station can expect five days of disruption starting Monday due to emergency overhead line repairs, according to ProRail. The work begins at 5 a.m.
description_zh: 据ProRail消息，由于紧急架空线路维修，鹿特丹中央车站的铁路旅客预计将从周一开始受到五天的干扰。维修工作将于早上5点开始。

title: Helmond man sentenced to eight years jail for decade-long sexual abuse of 20 children
title_zh: 一名赫尔蒙德男子因长达十年的性侵20名儿童被判处八年监禁
description: The Den Bosch court has sentenced 26-year-old Wesley W. from Helmond to eight years in prison plus involuntary psychiatric treatment for years of sexually abusing children.
description_zh: 登博斯法院判处来自赫尔蒙德的 26 岁男子韦斯利·W 八年监禁，并强制接受精神病治疗，罪名是多年来性虐待儿童。

title: Consumers face higher electricity charges at peak periods: ACM
title_zh: 消费者在高峰时段面临更高的电费：ACM
description: Dutch households may have to pay more to use electricity at peak times from 2028, the Dutch consumer and markets...
description_zh: 荷兰消费者和市场表示，从2028年起，荷兰家庭在用电高峰时段可能需要支付更高的电费……

title: Stint makers cleared of blame for the tragedy which killed four
title_zh: Stunt 制造商被免除与造成四人死亡的悲剧相关的责任。
description: The makers of an electric wagon used to transport groups of children will not be jailed for their role in...
description_zh: 用于运送儿童的电动车制造商不会因其在以下事件中所扮演的角色而被判入狱……

title: Schiphol maintains 60-euro passenger fee amid rising travel numbers
title_zh: 尽管旅客人数不断增加，史基浦机场仍维持60欧元的旅客服务费。
description: Schiphol will keep its airport charges at the current level in the coming years.
description_zh: 未来几年，史基浦机场将维持目前的收费水平。

title: Executives acquitted in deadly Stint cargo bike case that killed four children
title_zh: 在导致四名儿童死亡的Stint货运自行车致命案中，公司高管被判无罪。
description: The court in Den Bosch has acquitted businessmen Edwin Renzen and Peter Noorlander of criminal charges related to the flawed Stint electric cargo bike.
description_zh: 登博斯法院宣判商人埃德温·伦岑和彼得·诺兰德无罪，他们此前因有缺陷的 Stint 电动货运自行车而被控刑事罪名。

title: Teaching assistant jailed for abusing at least 20 children
title_zh: 一名教学助理因虐待至少20名儿童而被判入狱。
description: A 26-year-old teaching assistant from Helmond has been sentenced to eight years in prison and compulsory psychiatric treatment for sexually...
description_zh: 一名来自赫尔蒙德的26岁教学助理因性侵犯罪被判处八年监禁和强制精神治疗。

title: Nearly 5,800 people starve themselves to death in Netherlands per year: study
title_zh: 研究显示，荷兰每年约有5800人死于饥饿。
description: An estimated 5,800 people per year stopped eating and drinking between 2019 and 2023 because they wanted to end their lives, while around 2,000 a year used fatal doses of medication or sleeping pil
description_zh: 据估计，2019年至2023年间，每年约有5800人停止进食和饮水以结束生命，另有约2000人服用致命剂量的药物或安眠药。

title: Dutch parliament greenlights new Box 3 tax, set to take effect in 2028
title_zh: 荷兰议会批准新的第三类商品税，将于2028年生效。
description: Despite considerable resistance, a large majority in the lower house of the Dutch parliament approved a new system for taxing the returns on assets, also known as the Box 3 tax.
description_zh: 尽管遭到相当大的阻力，荷兰议会下院的绝大多数议员还是批准了一项新的资产收益征税制度，也称为“第三类税”。

title: Podcast: The Kok and Bol Story Edition
title_zh: 播客：Kok 和 Bol 的故事版
description: Want to support the DutchNews podcast and keep up our stocks of stroopwafels and orange tompouces? Click here to become...
description_zh: 想支持 DutchNews 播客，并让我们的焦糖华夫饼和橙味甜甜圈库存充足吗？点击此处成为……

title: Schiphol processes more passengers, sees growth in 2026
title_zh: 史基浦机场旅客吞吐量增加，预计2026年将实现增长。
description: The Schiphol airport authority expects Schiphol itself to process 68 to 72 million passengers this year, partly because airlines are...
description_zh: 史基浦机场管理局预计，今年史基浦机场本身将处理6800万至7200万名旅客，部分原因是航空公司……

title: No construction defects in Hague apartment building collapse; Explosion left 6 dead
title_zh: 海牙公寓楼倒塌事故并无建筑缺陷；爆炸造成6人死亡
description: An investigation by TNO into the Tarwekamp apartment complex in The Hague revealed no structural defects.
description_zh: TNO 对海牙 Tarwekamp 公寓楼的调查显示，该公寓楼不存在结构缺陷。

title: Dutch Resistance Museum opens Iran exhibit ahead of global protest day
title_zh: 荷兰抵抗运动博物馆在全球抗议日前夕开设伊朗展览
description: Today, the exhibitionWoman, Life, Freedom – Iranian women’s resistanceopens in theDutc
description_zh: 今天，展览“女性、生活、自由——伊朗女性的抵抗”在杜特尔特展览中心开幕。

title: More people in NL are choosing to die by starving themselves
title_zh: 在荷兰，越来越多的人选择绝食而死。
description: More people in the Netherlands end their lives by stopping eating and drinking, according an investigation by Erasmus medical centre...
description_zh: 根据伊拉斯谟医学中心的一项调查，荷兰选择停止进食和饮水结束生命的人数更多……

title: "What the fuck" and "happiest day": Dutch speed skaters celebrate two Olympic golds
title_zh: “卧槽”和“最快乐的一天”：荷兰速滑运动员庆祝两枚奥运金牌
description: “Happiest day of my life” and “what the fuck” were how Xandra Velzeboer and Jens van ‘t Woud, respectively, celebrated their Olympic gold medals in short track speed skating in Milan on T
description_zh: “这是我一生中最快乐的一天”和“这他妈到底是怎么回事”分别是桑德拉·维尔泽博尔和延斯·范特伍德在米兰奥运会短道速滑比赛中获得金牌后的庆祝语。

title: High workload & threats: Dutch gov’t urged to hike politicians’ salaries by up to 18%
title_zh: 工作量大且面临威胁：荷兰政府被敦促将政客薪酬提高至多18%
description: In recent years, politicians from aldermen to Ministers’ workloads have increased, as has the complexity of the issues they deal with and threats and intimidation they face.
description_zh: 近年来，从市议员到部长，政治人物的工作量不断增加，他们处理的问题也越来越复杂，他们面临的威胁和恐吓也越来越多。

title: Colder weekend ahead with frost and chance of snow
title_zh: 周末气温将下降，有霜冻和降雪的可能。
description: After a relatively mild week, temperatures are set to drop sharply this weekend, with frost at night and snow possible...
description_zh: 经过一周相对温和的天气后，本周末气温将急剧下降，夜间可能出现霜冻，并可能降雪……

title: Birds and the bees: Mauritshuis show explores avian inspiration
title_zh: 鸟与蜂：莫瑞泰斯皇家美术馆展览探索鸟类灵感
description: “Shall we go birdwatching?” Zullen we gaan vogelen? Sounds innocent enough, but according to a new exhibition in The Hague,...
description_zh: “我们去观鸟好吗？” Zullen we gaan vogelen? 听起来没什么特别的，但根据海牙的一项新展览……

title: Busy evening rush hour expected as school holidays, Carnival kick off
title_zh: 学校放假，狂欢节开始，预计晚高峰时段交通繁忙。
description: The road users’ association ANWB expects a busy evening rush hour on Friday as the school holiday starts in the Zuid and Midden regions of the Netherlands and the Dutch start heading to w
description_zh: 荷兰道路使用者协会ANWB预计，随着荷兰南部和中部地区学校假期开始，周五晚高峰时段交通将十分繁忙，荷兰民众也将开始前往西部地区。

title: MPs vote for hybrid Box 3 asset tax system but no-one is happy
title_zh: 议员们投票通过了混合型第三类资产税制度，但无人满意。
description: MPs on Thursday voted in favour of a new way of taxing private assets, which includes a shift to actual...
description_zh: 周四，议员们投票赞成一种新的私人资产征税方式，其中包括转向实际征税……

title: Dutch property values climb to €3,320 per m2; Biggest increases outside Randstad
title_zh: 荷兰房价攀升至每平方米3320欧元；兰斯塔德以外地区涨幅最大
description: Last year, the median property value (WOZ) of homes in the Netherlands was almost €3,320 per square meter of living space, 41 percent higher than in 2021, Statistics Netherlands (CBS)
description_zh: 去年，荷兰房屋的平均房价（WOZ）接近每平方米居住面积 3320 欧元，比 2021 年高出 41%，荷兰统计局（CBS）数据显示。

title: Klarna violates Dutch law by collecting debts without proper registration, experts say
title_zh: 专家称，Klarna在未进行适当注册的情况下收取债务，违反了荷兰法律。
description: The Swedish buy-now-pay-later bank Klarna is violating Dutch law by collecting outstanding debts from private individuals without being registered in the debt collection register, experts
description_zh: 专家表示，瑞典“先买后付”银行Klarna在未于债务催收登记册注册的情况下，向私人收取未偿债务，违反了荷兰法律。

title: Fewer tourists visit Zeeland as more Dutch visitors stay away
title_zh: 由于更多荷兰游客选择不去泽兰省，到访泽兰省的游客数量减少。
description: Tourist numbers rose across the Netherlands last year but fell in the southern province of Zeeland despite its popular beaches,...
description_zh: 去年荷兰各地的游客数量有所增长，但南部泽兰省的游客数量却有所下降，尽管该省拥有热门海滩……

title: Red Cross warns of cold weekend as Carnival set to kick off across the Netherlands
title_zh: 红十字会警告称，随着荷兰狂欢节即将拉开帷幕，周末气温将有所下降。
description: The Red Cross is cautioning carnival attendees to prepare for a chilly weekend and to take care of each other.
description_zh: 红十字会提醒参加狂欢节的人们做好应对寒冷周末的准备，并互相照顾。

title: Katwijk council overjoyed and concerned by arrival of $3 bil. Eli Lilly factory
title_zh: 卡特韦克市议会对30亿美元的礼来工厂到货感到既欣喜又担忧。
description: The Katwijk city council believes that the arrival of the major American pharmaceutical company Eli Lilly “offers a lot of great opportunities,” but also has concerns about the pharmaceut
description_zh: 卡特韦克市议会认为，美国大型制药公司礼来公司的到来“带来了许多绝佳机遇”，但也对这家制药公司存在担忧。

title: Probation service used error-ridden algorithms to assess risks
title_zh: 缓刑服务机构使用错误百出的算法来评估风险。
description: Yet another Dutch government department has become embroiled in a row over the use of algorithms – this time the...
description_zh: 荷兰又一个政府部门卷入了关于算法使用的争议——这次是……

title: New PVV asylum laws could lead to 19,000 extra lawsuits
title_zh: 新的PVV庇护法可能导致新增19000起诉讼
description: The Netherlands is facing a projected surge of 19,000 additional asylum cases in 2028 if two new asylum laws and the European migration pact are implemented, the Council for the Judiciary said, acc
description_zh: 荷兰司法委员会表示，如果两项新的庇护法和《欧洲移民公约》得以实施，预计到2028年，荷兰将面临19000起新增庇护申请。

title: Two golds and a silver boost Dutch speed skating medal haul
title_zh: 两枚金牌和一枚银牌提升了荷兰速滑项目的奖牌总数。
description: The Dutch have added three medals to their Olympic tally, with two golds and a silver in Thursday’s speed skating....
description_zh: 荷兰队在周四的速度滑冰比赛中获得两枚金牌和一枚银牌，为他们的奥运奖牌总数再添三枚。

title: Youth care org. still refuses to be open about years of foster child abuse: researchers
title_zh: 研究人员称，青少年关爱机构仍拒绝公开多年来虐待寄养儿童的情况。
description: Thesexual and physical abuse of foster childrenat the De Glind youth vil
description_zh: 德格林德青年村寄养儿童遭受性虐待和身体虐待

title: Europe could stop over a third of oil smuggling, espionage ships: report
title_zh: 报告称，欧洲或可阻止超过三分之一的石油走私和间谍船只活动。
description: Due to a new interpretation of maritime law, the Netherlands and other European countries can stop over a third of the vessels in the Russian, Iranian, and Venezuelan “shadow fleet” - tan
description_zh: 由于对海事法的新解释，荷兰和其他欧洲国家可以拦截俄罗斯、伊朗和委内瑞拉“影子舰队”中超过三分之一的船只。
